TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program - All Time Greatest Crafts (Up to latest release)

Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbonauts from Kerbin and beyond!

This is a new repository for those really good crafts. All the planes, the stations and rovers that you would have tried if you had clicked on the thread but were afraid to do so for fear of finding a dog's business. In creating this post I hope to enable the Kerbal Space Programmers to find and enjoy the great crafts out there, and I hope that's what you do! If you have any suggestions for additions to this list, just post the link to the craft's thread below.

Click on the craft names to go to their respective pages.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Planes/Spaceplanes

K-37 Raptor VTOL (RocketPilot573)

This brand new VTOL is sexy, stylish and functional all in one package.

KC-35 D Armadillo Kerbin Fast Attack Transport (barrenwaste)

Barrenwaste has created a good looking, 18-kerbal transport plane. Although his post contains some minor issues, this plane is pretty damn awesome.

ZoPL Debulist Mk IV (zekes)

This one man SSTO puts shame to the saying "If you got to orbit, you're half way to anywhere!". For this craft can most certainly go anywhere, with plenty of fuel left! The Debulist is an incredibly long-range awesomeness plane with free return tickets.

AF-273 VTOL Fighter (Jeb Cubed)

This VTOL is worthy of many titles. Sleek and manoeuvrable, this is a must have for all your... Your needs for something.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Launch Vehicles

Zenith Rocket Family (Temstar)

The Zenith Rocket Family is a launcher pack of all sizes to carry up to 108 tons to LKO. 7 crafts included.

Munshine Launcher Family (Wayfarer and Giggleplex777)

The Munshine Seriously Honking Large Launch Vehicles can take from a measly 10 to a whopping 100 tons of payload up to 100x100 orbit!

Jaekelopterus Heavy Lifter (Corona688)

The Jaekelopterus is the heaviest lifter there is, lugging a whopping 216 TONS up to orbit! Wow! Just imagine the explosion if you go the wrong way...

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Interplanetary Vessels

The Bulldog (Cupcake...)

The bulldog is your everyday workhorse for any of your exploration needs! In Cupcake...'s words: "Whether you're felling trees in the Kerbin highlands, laying down an oil pipeline, or just doing a spot of dynamite fishing with the guys, the Bulldog is the Dropship of choice for man work or man play. Hell yeah!". Comes in two flavors.

Duna-LK1 (Mulbin)

The Duna LK-1 is a Soyuz inspired Duna return rocket, complete with mini buggy and sexy, compact lander. Amazing, definitely recommended if you want a themed cruise.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Munar/Minmus landers

Munbug X (Mulbin)

The Munbug is an absolutely amazing, original and beautiful Saturn-V style Moon Rocket. You cannot compliment this enough no matter what, It is almost flawlessly designed. Definitely recommended.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Space Stations

Farscape Launchpoint (Arendey)

This interplanetary-capable station, created by a new and not much known user, is stunning. Arendey's new station comes complete with tugs and plenty of pure, hard firepower. Laggy at launch (and a kind of bash-together launch vehicle), but other than that, a great craft.

O.A.S.I.S Stardock and Station Systems (Colonel_Panic)

"In it's standard complete configuration it totals over 1000 parts in 37 modules, assembleable via 25 launches, with a dry mass of over 375 tons, and stores 448 tons of fuel and 19 tons of mono-propellant for a total mass of over 840 tons, and a maximum capacity of 134 kerbals, with a permanent crew of 56, which can be returned to Kerbin or other atmospheric bodies safely via escape vehicle. It also houses 22 standard docking ports, 16 mini docking ports, and 2 large docking ports, not counting the expandable station nodes." says the author. WHAT?

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Base(s)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Rovers

Tropis Mk 11 (Spartwo)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Career Mode Friendly

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Misc.

Zumwalt Stealth Destroyer (Zekes)

Covered in scary looking plating and stunning realism, Zekes presents the Zumwalt Stealth Destroyer. Of course, all the weapons are fake. Guns are dangerous!

The light end Zenith's are career friendly in lower tier IF you remove a couple things like nosecones and tiny probe pods.

Would you consider my VTOL Launch vehicle? The Black Night III

It can get up to a 42 ton payload into 100x100 and all in a single stage!

Would you consider my VTOL Launch vehicle? The Black Night III

It is a very capable vehicle. But this is a very common and known way to launch things into orbit, and intake stacking is not very subtle. I am sorry, I hope you aren't disappointed.

BTW, nice name.
